com.google.gxp.compiler.codegen
Class DefaultCodeGeneratorFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gxp.compiler.codegen.DefaultCodeGeneratorFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
CodeGeneratorFactory
public class DefaultCodeGeneratorFactory
extends Object
implements CodeGeneratorFactory

Default implementation of CodeGeneratorFactory. Note that instances of this class are mutable. In particular, the individual "options" (which are typically only used for constructing certain types of CodeGenerators) can be modified via setters.

Method Detail

getRuntimeMessageSource

public String getRuntimeMessageSource()

setRuntimeMessageSource

public void setRuntimeMessageSource(String runtimeMessageSource)
Sets the "message source" to use at runtime, or null if none was supplied. In Java this corresponds to the baseName for the ResourceBundle.

Note that not setting this (that is, leaving it set to null) may prevent the compilation of GXPs that contain <gxp:msg> elements.

See Also:
MessageBundle

isDynamicModeEnabled

public boolean isDynamicModeEnabled()

setDynamicModeEnabled

public void setDynamicModeEnabled(boolean dynamicModeEnabled)
Sets whether compiled code should attempt to dynamically reload and recompile GXPs at runtime.

setSourceFiles

public void setSourceFiles(Collection<FileRef> sourceFiles)
Sets the source files used when compiling this set of GXPs. Needed when creating runtime stubs.

setSchemaFiles

public void setSchemaFiles(Collection<FileRef> schemaFiles)
Sets the schema files used when compiling this set of GXPs. Needed when creating runtime stubs. This is only the user-provided schemas, not the built-in ones.

setSourcePaths

public void setSourcePaths(Collection<FileRef> sourcePaths)
Sets the source paths used when compiling this set of GXPs. Needed when creating runtime stubs.

setAlertPolicy

public void setAlertPolicy(AlertPolicy alertPolicy)
Sets the AlertPolicy used when compiling this set of GXPs. Needed when creating runtime stubs.
